str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.
From the same as aei; properly, an age; by extension, perpetuity; by implication, the world; specially a Messianic period.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Inviolable, unchangeable. Not passing away, i.e. Untransferable.
The abstract notion of the priestly office. From hieros; sacredness, i.e. the priestly office.
